alert.note: Alert for Saginaw; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 10:25AM EDT until April 07 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Shiawassee River At Owosso affecting Shiawassee and Saginaw Counties. .Dry conditions are forecast through the weekend, allowing the river level to gradually recede below flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Shiawassee River At Owosso. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Impact...At 6.0 feet, Some adjacent lowland floods. At 7.0 feet, Flooding begins in residential area along Jerome Avenue east of South Washington Avenue in Owosso. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
